title: Beef Barley Soup
steps: Brown beef in batches in oil, about 5 minutes per batch.
Cook onion, carrots, celery until softened, 8 minutes.
Add garlic and tomato paste, cook 1 minute.
Add broth, water, barley, bay leaves, thyme. Return beef.
Simmer covered until beef and barley are tender, 1¼ hours.
Remove bay leaves, stir in parsley. Season to taste.
notes: Don't skip browning the beef - builds the flavor base.
Add more broth when reheating - barley absorbs liquid.
